Uses of Class
com.google.common.truth.PrimitiveFloatArraySubject.TolerantPrimitiveFloatArrayComparison

  • Packages that use PrimitiveFloatArraySubject.TolerantPrimitiveFloatArrayComparison 
    Package Description
    com.google.common.truth
    Truth is an open source, fluent testing framework for Java that is designed to make your test assertions and failure messages more readable.

    • Uses of PrimitiveFloatArraySubject.TolerantPrimitiveFloatArrayComparison in com.google.common.truth

      Methods in com.google.common.truth that return PrimitiveFloatArraySubject.TolerantPrimitiveFloatArrayComparison 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PrimitiveFloatArraySubject.TolerantPrimitiveFloatArrayComparison PrimitiveFloatArraySubject.hasValuesNotWithin(float tolerance)
      Deprecated. 
      Write a for loop over the values looking for mismatches (see this implementation for an example)
      PrimitiveFloatArraySubject.TolerantPrimitiveFloatArrayComparison PrimitiveFloatArraySubject.hasValuesWithin(float tolerance)
      Deprecated. 
      Use PrimitiveFloatArraySubject.usingTolerance(double), e.g. assertThat(floatArray).usingTolerance(1e-5).containsExactly(1.2f, 3.4f, 5.6f).inOrder();
